name: Trip + Trap
description:
Trip & Trap

-----==-----

Traverse the Trip side of the room, avoiding or using the various Tripped Colors

Flip over to the Trap side, and navigate though the obstacles that you have made.

-----==-----

Controls

(A + D / Left Arrow + Right Arrow) -- Move

S / Down Arrow -- Crouch

Space / Up Arrow -- Jump

E -- Interact

Esc / P -- Pause

R -- Reset Room

-----==-----

Let me know if the MAC version works, was unable to test it
